description: Eight weekly quizzes assessing lab work completion, auto-marked via LMS with feedback provided. Involves UNIX shell usage, bioinformatics tools, R environment analysis, proteomics data interpretation, and protein structure prediction methods.
2-hour exam assessing weeks 1-5 content through short essay questions. Evaluates understanding of biological concepts, method limitations, and protein structure prediction approaches.

Official UNSW exam period assessment covering weeks 7-10 content. Tests biological concepts understanding, method limitations analysis, R environment data analysis, and proteomics experiment interpretation.
